attributes.action: Reintroduce the death penalty for the killer(s) of Thavisha Lakindu Peiris.
attributes.additional_details: If there is one honourable act our blatantly DISHONOURABLE electeds can do, it is to bring back execution for those convicted of killing another human being.  Deprivation of the human right to life by one person of another person MUST attract the ultimate punishment - immediately on conviction.
